sections.paragraph: படியே, போ, பிரகாரமாய், ஏறக்குறைய, ஒப்பாக, உடனே, பொழுது - வினையடை
as, like as, even as, according as, in the same manner as

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Probably adverb of compound from G3739; which how, that is, in that manner (very variously used as shown): - about, after (that), (according) as (it had been, it were), as soon (as), even as (like), for, how (greatly), like (as, unto), since, so (that), that, to wit, unto, when ([-soever]), while, X with all speed.
